Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Hardness... Good. Durability test... Pass. Heat resistance test... Pass. Done. Testing complete for this dagger.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Here you are! Seeing as you've collected so many daggers, it must be tough to maintain them.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "So, I helped you with maintenance on them before you came back. You're welcome.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Just call me when you need me. Besides, I can only help you in limited ways because of circumstances.', 4: '1'}
